<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get BRC-20 Ticker Info</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/brc20/{ticker}/info"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get the infomation of BRC-20 by ticker.
